ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Post from Abashi regarding archery
ygData.msgSnippet: you don t need to charm, just use sneak.  ranger with my used harmony, i snuck behind him and gave him the note.  the doppelganger attacked and the regular guy
ygData.messageBody:
you don't need to charm, just use sneak. ranger with my used harmony, i
snuck behind him and gave him the note. the doppelganger attacked and the
regular guy didn't move =) if no harmony then sneak still works but they
will both attack.

Shada

> note that the head you want is off the doppleganger that
> spawns after you
> give him the note. we actually root/atoned marigal and
> pulled his doppleganger
> away to kill him.
>
> and we used that charm thing to give him the note. he will
> break charm as soon
> as you give him the note and the doppleganger will spawn, so be ready.
